event.title: had been detected in nearby villages of Bumbacari and Dudescu in previous tests on Thursday

data.event: The H5 virus had been detected in nearby villages of Bumbacari and Dudescu in previous tests on Thursday.

event.title: had been infected by the disease for more than two months

data.event: Though tough measures are being taken in the area, villagers say their poultry had been infected by the disease for more than two months without any official action being taken.
